item.title: 随着贸易恢复，多批美国大豆将运往中国
item.description: 彭博社看到的一份船货清单显示，在贸易协定为向中国发货开辟道路之后，多批美国大豆正准备运往中国。【原文：Several US soybean cargoes are being prepared for China, according to a ship lineup seen by Bloomberg, after a trade pact opened the way for shipments to the Asian nation.】

item.title: 交易员关注印度央行是否会出人意料地降息
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 上海审查社交媒体上谈论房地产市场的帖子
item.description: 上海当局正在审查那些对房地产市场持悲观态度的社交媒体帖子，这凸显了这个金融中心的监管机构为遏制日益加深的房地产危机所采取的措施。【原文：Shanghai authorities are censoring social media posts that express a pessimistic outlook on the housing market, underscoring the lengths regulators in the financial hub are taking to stem the deepening property crisis.】

item.title: 中国万科空头押注创十年新高，债券延期引发愤怒情绪
item.description: 在香港，对中国万科的看跌押注攀升至十年来的新高，因为投资者押注该开发商的股价将在其令人震惊的债券延迟支付后继续下行。【原文：Bearish bets on China Vanke Co. climbed to a decade high in Hong Kong as investors wagered that the downward spiral in the developer’s shares will extend following its shock bond payment delay.】

item.title: 中国服务业活动再次放缓，显示经济疲软
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，中国服务业活动的扩张速度为五个月来最弱，这进一步证明了消费需求疲软，给正在放缓的经济带来了更大压力。【原文：China’s services activity expanded at the weakest pace in five months, a private survey showed, adding more evidence of sluggish consumer demand that’s putting further pressure on a slowing economy.】

item.title: 印度称在遭到反弹后可删除强制性手机应用程序
item.description: 印度试图消除人们对其在手机上预装网络安全应用程序的任务可能会侵犯隐私或使监控成为可能的担忧，称个人可以从设备上删除该软件。【原文：India sought to address concerns that its mandate to pre-install a cybersecurity app on mobile phones could invade privacy or enable surveillance, saying individuals can remove the software from devices.】

item.title: 美巢启动 6.03 亿美元印度首次公开募股的投资者订单
item.description: 由软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp. ）支持的印度电子商务公司 Meesho Ltd. 周三开始接受首次公开募股订单，募集资金可能高达 542 亿卢比（约合 6.03 亿美元）。【原文：Meesho Ltd., an Indian e-commerce firm backed by SoftBank Group Corp., started taking orders Wednesday for an initial public offering that may raise as much as 54.2 billion rupees ($603 million).】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会叫停高杠杆 ETF 计划，发出风险警告
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会已向美国一些最活跃的交易所交易基金提供商发出了大量警告信，有效阻止了旨在提供两到三倍于股票、大宗商品和加密货币日回报率的产品的推出。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission has issued a flurry of warning letters to some of the country’s most prolific providers of high-octane exchange-traded funds, effectively blocking the introduction of products designed to deliver two or three times the daily returns of stocks, commodities and cryptocurrencies.】

item.title: 出口下滑，马来西亚棕榈储备量创六年新高
item.description: 一项调查显示，由于 11 月份出口下降，马来西亚的棕榈油库存飙升至六年多来的最高水平。【原文：Palm oil stockpiles in Malaysia surged to the highest in more than six years as exports dropped in November, according to a survey.】

item.title: Ashmore 价值 23 亿美元的基金经理依靠印度职业女性推动业绩增长
item.description: 拉希-塔尔瓦-巴蒂亚（Rashi Talwar Bhatia）说，印度劳动力中女性人数的不断增加让她想起了 20 世纪 60 年代美国的女权运动。【原文：Rashi Talwar Bhatia says the growing presence of women in India’s workforce reminds her of the feminist movement seen in the US in the 1960s.】

item.title: 欧盟敲定到 2027 年逐步停止进口俄罗斯天然气的协议
item.description: 欧盟已达成一项协议，将在 2027 年前逐步淘汰俄罗斯的天然气，这是欧盟就莫斯科入侵乌克兰一事向其施加压力的最新举措。【原文：The European Union has reached a deal to phase out Russian natural gas by 2027, the latest move to ratchet up pressure on Moscow over its invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 美国交易刺激美元需求，韩国将海外债券上限提高三倍
item.description: 韩国已将外汇稳定债券的年度发行上限提高到原计划的三倍以上，因为韩国当局正准备应对因与美国达成贸易协议而激增的美元需求。【原文：South Korea has more than tripled its annual cap on foreign exchange stabilization bond issuance from its original plans, as authorities prepare to deal with a surge in dollar demand stemming from a trade deal with the US.】

item.title: 澳大利亚经济增长令人失望，加息预期减弱
item.description: 澳大利亚上一季度的经济增长速度出人意料地放缓，为其基本实力蒙上了一层阴影，并表明市场对加息的定价可能为时过早。【原文：Australia’s economy grew at a surprisingly softer pace last quarter, clouding the picture on its underlying strength and suggesting markets may have been premature in pricing interest-rate hikes.】

item.title: 普京访印考验新德里的美俄平衡术
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京将于本周访问印度，这是俄罗斯入侵乌克兰以来普京首次访问印度，在新德里寻求与华盛顿敲定贸易协议之际，这次罕见的访问凸显了两国的国防和能源关系。【原文：President Vladimir Putin is set to visit India this week for the first time since Russia’s invasion of Ukraine, a rare trip that underscores the countries’ defense and energy ties as New Delhi seeks to finalize a trade deal with Washington.】

item.title: 白银因降息押注和供应紧张而稳定在历史高位附近
item.description: 白银在前七个交易日反弹约17%后，在创纪录附近企稳，原因是交易商纷纷押注利率下调，同时市场供应持续紧张。黄金持平。【原文：Silver steadied near a record after rallying about 17% over the previous seven sessions as traders piled into bets for lower interest rates, while the market faced ongoing supply tightness. Gold was flat.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行布洛克警告董事会将就新的价格压力采取行动
item.description: 澳大利亚央行行长米歇尔-布洛克（Michele Bullock）周三表示，澳大利亚央行正密切关注通胀压力，并准备在通胀出现回升迹象时采取行动，这暗示官员们可能不得不重新转向紧缩政策。【原文：Australia’s central bank is closely monitoring inflation pressures and is ready to act in the event they show signs of regaining strength, Governor Michele Bullock said Wednesday, a hint that officials may yet have to pivot back toward tightening.】

item.title: 交易员权衡俄乌战争下一步行动，石油止跌回升
item.description: 在美国和俄罗斯举行高级别会谈后，交易商对结束乌克兰战争的前景进行了权衡，同时莫斯科能源资产继续受到攻击，因此石油维持跌势。【原文：Oil held a decline as traders weighed the outlook for an end to the war in Ukraine following high-level talks between the US and Russia, while attacks on Moscow’s energy assets continued.】

item.title: Check Point 将通过零息可转换债券融资 15 亿美元
item.description: Check Point 软件技术有限公司正在通过出售五年期零息可转换债券筹集 15 亿美元，部分资金将用于股票回购。【原文：Check Point Software Technologies Ltd. is raising $1.5 billion from the sale of a five-year zero-coupon convertible bond, partly to help fund share buybacks.】

item.title: UltraGreen.ai 首次公开募股 4 亿美元后将在新加坡上市交易
item.description: UltraGreen.ai将于周三上午开始交易，这是新加坡自2017年以来除房地产投资信托外最大的首次公开募股。【原文：UltraGreen.ai is set to begin trading Wednesday morning in Singapore’s biggest initial public offering since 2017 excluding real estate investment trusts.】

item.title: 汇丰资产称中国债券收益率可能回落至历史最高水平
item.description: 汇丰银行资产管理公司（HSBC Asset Management）称，由于经济复苏不平衡，中国央行面临降息压力，明年中国政府债券收益率可能回落至历史最低水平。【原文：China’s government bond yields are likely to fall back toward a record low next year as an uneven economic recovery puts pressure on the central bank to cut interest rates, according to HSBC Asset Management.】

item.title: YouTube 最终将遵守澳大利亚对 16 岁以下儿童的禁令
item.description: 澳大利亚即将对 16 岁以下青少年实施社交媒体禁令，YouTube 正在采取措施遵守这一禁令，尽管此前该公司曾拒绝将其纳入打击范围，并有猜测称该公司正在考虑向法院提出挑战。【原文：YouTube is taking steps to comply with Australia’s upcoming under-16s social media ban, even after rejecting its inclusion in the crackdown and speculation that the company was considering a court challenge.】

item.title: 加密货币反弹，亚洲股市谨慎上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街股市小幅上扬、加密货币反弹标志着风险偏好回升之后，亚洲股市周三开盘大体向好。【原文：Asian stocks were set for a mostly positive open on Wednesday following modest gains on Wall Street and a rebound in cryptocurrencies that signaled pockets of returning risk appetite.】

item.title: Medline 考虑最快于下周一进行 50 亿美元的首次公开募股 (IPO)
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Medline 公司最快将于下周一正式开始首次公开募股的市场推广工作，这有望成为今年美国最大的一次上市。【原文：Medline Inc. is set to begin formal marketing for its initial public offering as soon as Monday, according to people familiar with the matter, in what’s expected to be the biggest US listing this year.】

item.title: JD.com 供应链技术部门在香港首次公开募股中寻求高达 4.24 亿美元的投资
item.description: JD.com Inc.的供应链技术部门已开始接受香港首次公开募股的投资者订单，募集资金可能高达33亿港元（4.24亿美元），为两年多的上市努力画上了句号。【原文：JD.com Inc.’s supply-chain technology unit has started taking investor orders for a Hong Kong initial public offering that may raise as much as HK$3.3 billion ($424 million), capping more than two years of efforts to go public.】

item.title: 甲骨文信贷恐惧指数创 2009 年以来新高，原因是担心人工智能泡沫破裂
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）债务风险指数收于金融危机以来的最高水平，此前科技巨头纷纷抛售债券，加剧了人们对人工智能行业正在形成泡沫的担忧。【原文：A risk gauge on Oracle Corp. debt closed at the highest level since the financial crisis after a flood of bond sales from tech giants amplified concerns that a bubble is forming in the artificial-intelligence industry.】

item.title: 科技行业阻止各州人工智能法的努力在国会碰壁
item.description: 美国国会一位重要的共和党人周二表示，白宫人工智能主管支持的一个强大的科技公司联盟似乎未能说服立法者利用一项必须通过的国防法案来阻止州政府对人工智能进行监管。【原文：A powerful coalition of tech companies backed by the White House’s artificial intelligence chief appears to have failed to persuade lawmakers to use a must-pass defense bill to block state governments from regulating artificial intelligence, a key congressional Republican signaled Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国顶级经济学家称现在是允许人民币走强的时候了
item.description: 中国最大的投资银行之一的一位经济学家说，现在是政府允许人民币进一步升值的时候了，这一决定将为消费者提供更大的消费能力，并为贸易紧张局势降温。【原文：An economist at one of China’s biggest investment banks said the time has come for authorities to allow for more appreciation in the yuan, a decision that would give consumers greater spending power and cool trade tensions.】

item.title: Novaland 目标于 6 月发行零售债券以解决债务问题
item.description: 越南最大的房地产公司之一诺瓦兰投资集团（Novaland Investment Group）正在洽谈筹集新的资金，以偿还一些未偿还债券，同时计划通过恢复停滞的项目来恢复盈利。【原文：Novaland Investment Group, one of Vietnam’s largest real estate firms, is in talks to raise fresh funds to repay some outstanding bonds as it plots a return to profitability by resuming stalled projects.】

item.title: S&P 将 AI-Power Darling Vistra 的评级提升至投资级
item.description: 威仕达公司（Vistra Corp. —）是人工智能热潮中美国电力行业最大的受益者之一，S&P.将其评级提升至投资级。【原文：Vistra Corp. — one of the biggest US power-sector beneficiaries of the AI boom — was upgraded to investment grade by S&P.】

item.title: 安全公司 UL Solutions 所有者发售 1250 万股股票
item.description: 在 UL Solutions 公司首次公开募股一年半之后，该公司的非营利所有者将发售 1250 万股股票。【原文：The nonprofit owner of UL Solutions Inc. is offering 12.5 million shares for sale, a year and a half after the safety testing firm’s initial public offering.】
